select count(*) AS amount from `md_success` where baoxianqi >=CURDATE() AND md_atime >=CONCAT(CURDATE(),' 00:00:00') AND md_atime <=CONCAT(CURDATE(),' 23:59:59') AND user_name = #userName#
and yw_id=1
and yw_id=10
and yw_id=11
and yw_id=2 AND pettycash!= '新发卡备用金'
and yw_id=2 AND pettycash= '新发卡备用金'

select
IFNULL(sum(TRAN_AMT), 0.00) AS money from mdx_epp
IFNULL(sum(R_BDJE), 0.00) AS money from mdx_zdfq
where baoxianqi >=CURDATE() AND md_atime >=CONCAT(CURDATE(),' 00:00:00') AND md_atime <=CONCAT(CURDATE(),' 23:59:59') AND user_name =#userName#;

select IFNULL(sum(YSED), 0.00) AS money from
mdx_deczj where 1=1
mdx_eppc where Data_type!='新发卡备用金'
mdx_eppc where Data_type='新发卡备用金'
and baoxianqi >=CURDATE() AND md_atime >=CONCAT(CURDATE(),' 00:00:00') AND md_atime <=CONCAT(CURDATE(),' 23:59:59') and md_source ='get' and user_name =#userName#

select IFNULL(sum(PHJE), 0.00) AS money from
mdx_deczj where 1=1
mdx_eppc where Data_type!='新发卡备用金'
mdx_eppc where Data_type='新发卡备用金'
and baoxianqi >=CURDATE() AND md_atime >=CONCAT(CURDATE(),' 00:00:00') AND md_atime <=CONCAT(CURDATE(),' 23:59:59') and md_source in('S','T','U') and user_name =#userName#

SELECT COUNT(a.rw_hid) AS amount FROM `bps_rw_history` a left join md_success b on a.md_id=b.md_id where a.rw_ctime >=CONCAT(CURDATE(),' 00:00:00') AND a.rw_ctime <=CONCAT(CURDATE(),' 23:59:59') AND a.callid !=' ' AND b.md_atime >=CONCAT(CURDATE(),' 00:00:00') AND b.md_atime <=CONCAT(CURDATE(),' 23:59:59') AND a.user_name=#userName#
and b.yw_id=1
and b.yw_id=10
and b.yw_id=11
and b.yw_id=2 AND b.assignDataType!= '新发卡备用金'
and b.yw_id=2 AND b.assignDataType= '新发卡备用金'

select DISTINCT a.md_id from bps_rw_history a LEFT JOIN md_success b ON a.md_id=b.md_id LEFT JOIN internet_ipcc.t_toll_universal c on a.callid=c.invokeId where b.md_atime >=CONCAT(CURDATE(),' 00:00:00') AND a.user_name = #userName# AND a.callid!='' AND a.rw_ctime >=CONCAT(CURDATE(),' 00:00:00') AND c.invokeId!=''
and b.yw_id=1 AND a.yw_type='EPP'
and b.yw_id=10 AND a.yw_type='账单分期'
and b.yw_id=11 AND a.yw_type='大额EPPC'
and b.yw_id=2 AND b.pettycash!= '新发卡备用金' AND a.yw_type='EPPC'
and b.yw_id=2 AND b.pettycash= '新发卡备用金' AND a.yw_type='EPPC'

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT a.md_id) AS amount FROM `bps_rw_history` a left join md_success b on a.md_id=b.md_id where a.rw_ctime >=CONCAT(CURDATE(),' 00:00:00') AND a.rw_ctime <=CONCAT(CURDATE(),' 23:59:59') AND a.callid !='' and a.Rw_Status_sn='A' AND b.md_atime >=CONCAT(CURDATE(),' 00:00:00') AND b.md_atime <=CONCAT(CURDATE(),' 23:59:59') AND a.user_name=#userName#
AND b.yw_type='EPP'
AND b.yw_type='账单分期'
AND b.yw_type='大额EPPC'
AND b.pettycash!= '新发卡备用金' AND b.yw_type='EPPC'
AND b.pettycash= '新发卡备用金' AND b.yw_type='EPPC'
